title: AI Summit Controversy: Allegations of Chinese Products Overshadow Event
description: Rahul Gandhi a prominent Congress leader has termed the recent AI Summit as a disorganized PR spectacle amidst allegations that Chinese products are being highlighted at the event He expressed concerns over Indias talent and data not being utilized effectively

title: Duluth schools press pause on AI integration in high schools
description: The school district has temporarily halted its plan to integrate Google's Gemini AI on high school student devices, originally set to launch Feb. 23.

title: Nvidia partners Reliance, L&T, TCS, others for GPU infra at AI Summit
description: Nvidia's partnerships come at a time when India’s $283-billion IT services industry is under pressure from foundational AI companies such as OpenAI and Anthropic.
